REQUEST_ACCESS_FORM.TITLE: Ups! It seems that another user has already claimed the Space. Would you like to request access to the owner?

TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS_FORM.TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS: I swear I am the owner of the current ID that is about to be created. I have all the documents to support me. I'm able to present or send all my documents when this page request it. In case of broken the law I am willing to accept punishment of the current page and from the state where I currently live.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS_FORM.ACCEPT_CHECK: Agree with the terms and conditions.
TERMS_AND_CONDITIONS_FORM.SUGGESTION: You must agree with the terms and conditions.

SPACE_DELETE_MODAL.QUESTION: Are you sure you want to delete the space
SPACE_DELETE_MODAL.MESSAGE_WARNING: This will delete all resources associated with the space {{space}} and cannont be undone. Make sure this is something you really want to do!

GETTING_STARTED.READY_MESSAGE: You are ready to start using Clarksnut. To getting start please clic on the next button.
